TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: 提供不受格式影響的資料傳送機制。

span.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IDataObject`介面由類別和拖放作業中。The `IDataObject` interface is used by the class and in drag-and-drop operations. 類別中實作時方法可讓使用者將資料儲存在多個類別的執行個體中的格式。When implemented in a class, the methods allow the user to store data in multiple formats in an instance of the class. 將資料儲存在多個格式增加目標應用程式，您可能不知道其格式需求，可以擷取儲存的資料的機會。Storing data in more than one format increases the chance that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can retrieve the stored data. 若要將資料儲存在執行個體，呼叫方法和指定的資料格式`format`參數。To store data in an instance of , call the method and specify the data format in the `format` parameter. 設定`autoConvert`參數`false`如果您不想要擷取的時間轉換成另一種格式儲存的資料。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` if you do not want stored data to be converted to another format when it is retrieved. 叫用某個執行個體上多次將資料儲存在一個以上的格式。Invoke multiple times on one instance of to store data in more than one format. 擷取儲存的資料，從藉由呼叫方法並指定資料格式化`format`參數。You retrieve stored data from an by calling the method and specifying the data format in the `format` parameter. 設定`autoConvert`參數`false`來擷取指定的格式儲存的資料。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to retrieve only data that was stored in the specified format. 若要將儲存的資料轉換成指定的格式，將`autoConvert`至`true`，或請勿使用`autoConvert`。To convert the stored data to the specified format, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use `autoConvert`. 若要判斷中儲存之資料的格式，使用下列方法。To determine the formats of the data stored in an , use the following methods. - 呼叫方法來擷取的陣列中的所有格式的資料可供使用。Call the method to retrieve an array of all the formats in which the data is available. 設定`autoConvert`參數`false`取得僅將資料的儲存格式。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to get only the formats in which the data is stored. 若要取得資料已使用的所有格式，請設定`autoConvert`至`true`，或不使用這個參數。To get all the formats in which the data is available, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use this parameter. - 呼叫方法，以判斷是否可用於特定格式儲存的資料。Call the method to determine whether stored data is available in a certain format. 如果您不想要轉換成指定的格式儲存的資料，設定`autoConvert`參數`false`。If you do not want stored data to be converted to the specified format, set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`. 請參閱實作這個介面的類別。See the class for an implementation of this interface. 請參閱預先定義的類別資料格式。See the class for the predefined data formats.

summary.span: 擷取與指定資料格式產生關聯的資料。

span.span: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetData (string format);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetData(string format) cil managed
Public Function GetData (format As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetData(System::String ^ format);
abstract member GetData : string -> obj

param.name: format
param.span: 要擷取的資料格式。

span.span: The format of the data to retrieve.

param.span: 如需預先定義的格式，請參閱 。

span.span: See for predefined formats.

summary.span: 擷取與指定資料格式產生關聯的資料。

span.span: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.

returns.span: 與指定之格式或 產生關聯的資料。

span.span: The data associated with the specified format, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，則這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`. 若要判斷資料是否相關，或可以轉換成格式，請呼叫之前先呼叫。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 呼叫取得一份有效的格式，這個執行個體中儲存的資料。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject,`來示範如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject,` to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 方法用來擷取儲存在資料`myDataObject`，這與相關聯`Text`格式。The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myDataObject`, which is associated with the `Text` format. 這個範例假設您已經建立名為`Form1`和名為`textBox1`。The example assumes that you have already created a named `Form1` and a named `textBox1`. [!code-cpp[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/CPP/getdata1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/CS/getdata1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/VB/getdata1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，則這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`. 若要判斷資料是否相關，或可以轉換成格式，請呼叫之前先呼叫。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 呼叫取得一份有效的格式，這個執行個體中儲存的資料。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 方法用來擷取儲存在資料`myObject`，特定的類型，與相關聯`myType`。The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myObject`, which is associated with a specific type, `myType`. 所擷取的資料類型會顯示在訊息方塊。The type of the retrieved data is displayed in a message box. 這個範例假設您已經建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/CPP/getdata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/CS/getdata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/VB/getdata2.vb#1)]

returns.span: 與指定之格式或 產生關聯的資料。

span.span: The data associated with the specified format, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`autoConvert`參數是`true`而且這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，或如果資料已儲存與`autoConvert`參數設定為`false`，這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果`autoConvert`參數是`false`，這個方法會傳回資料中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到沒有此格式的資料。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要判斷資料是否相關，或可以轉換成格式，請呼叫之前先呼叫。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 呼叫取得一份有效的格式，這個執行個體中儲存的資料。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 此範例會擷取儲存在資料`DataObject`，並使用`autoConvert`參數來指定是否要轉換的資料格式。The example retrieves the data stored in a `DataObject`, using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether or not to convert the data format. 首先，`myDataObject`建立文字資料。First, `myDataObject` is created with text data. 然後此範例會嘗試兩次來擷取資料。Then the example tries twice to retrieve the data. 在第一次的試用版，它會指定它的格式字串和集合`autoConvert`參數`false`。In the first trial, it specifies its format as a string and sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`. 這個試用版失敗，而且結果會顯示在訊息方塊標示為 「 訊息 #1 」。This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1." 第二個的試用版，在此範例會擷取相同的資料與`autoConvert`參數設定為`true`。In the second trial, the example retrieves the same data with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 這個試用版成功，而且結果會顯示在訊息方塊標示為 「 訊息 #2 」。This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2." 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/CPP/getdata3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/CS/getdata3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/VB/getdata3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以判斷格式是否存在於這之前先呼叫。Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this before calling . 呼叫的格式，這個執行個體中可用。Call for the formats that are available in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件，使用字串和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object using a string and the `Text` format. 然後它會確認資料已存在於`Text`格式，並將結果顯示在訊息方塊。Then it verifies that the data is present in the `Text` format and displays the results in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以判斷格式是否存在於這之前先呼叫。Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this before calling . 呼叫的格式，這個執行個體中可用。Call for the formats that are available in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method. 首先，它會建立元件 (`myComponent`) 並將它儲存在資料物件 (`myDataObject`)。First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`). 接著它會檢查指定的資料是否儲存在`myDataObject`。Then it checks whether the specified data is stored in `myDataObject`. 如果測試判斷值`true`，它會在訊息方塊中顯示結果，並在文字方塊中顯示的資料類型。If the test evaluates `true`, it displays the result in a message box and displays the data type in a text box. 這個範例假設您已經建立名為`Form1`和名為`textBox1`。This example assumes that you have already created a named `Form1` and a named `textBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以判斷格式是否存在於這之前先呼叫。Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this before calling . 呼叫的格式，這個執行個體中可用。Call for the formats that are available in this instance. 這個方法會傳回`true`時：This method returns `true` when: - `autoConvert`參數是`true`且資料在可以轉換成適當格式的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and the data is in a format that can be converted to the appropriate format. - `autoConvert`參數是`false`且資料在適當的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and the data is in the appropriate format. 這個方法會傳回`false`時：This method returns `false` when: - `autoConvert`參數是`true`和這個方法中指定的格式，找不到資料並不能在資料轉換成指定的格式，或儲存資料時`autoConvert`設`false`。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, and it cannot convert data to the specified format, or the data was stored with `autoConvert` set to `false`. - `autoConvert`參數是`false`，與資料不存在於此執行個體中指定的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, and data does not exist in this instance in the specified format. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件 (`myDataObject`) 使用字串和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format. 然後它會查詢相關聯的資料物件`Text`格式，與`autoConvert`參數設定為`false`。Then it queries the object for data associated with the `Text` format, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 這個試用版失敗，而且結果會顯示在訊息方塊標示為 「 訊息 #1 」。This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1." 在第二個的試用版，它會設定`autoConvert`參數`true`。In the second trial, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`. 這個試用版成功，而且結果會顯示在訊息方塊標示為 「 訊息 #2 」。This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2." 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/CPP/getdatapresent3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/CS/getdatapresent3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/VB/getdatapresent3.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回與儲存於這個執行個體中的資料相關的，或者可以轉換的所有格式的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to.

summary.span: 傳回與儲存於這個執行個體中的資料相關的，或者可以轉換的所有格式的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to.

returns.span: 名稱陣列，表示這個物件中儲存的資料所支援的所有格式的清單。

span.span: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以取得支援的資料格式，然後再呼叫方法。Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the method. 請參閱類別預先定義的格式。See the class for the predefined formats. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetFormats`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件 (`myDataObject`) 使用字串和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format. 然後它會擷取所有的資料格式以及在資料物件中的資料轉換格式，並在訊息方塊中顯示結果清單。Then it retrieves all the data formats and data conversion formats in the data object, and displays the resulting list in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/CPP/getformats1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/CS/getformats1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/VB/getformats1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string[] GetFormats (bool autoConvert);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetFormats(bool autoConvert) cil managed
Public Function GetFormats (autoConvert As Boolean) As String()
public: cli::array <System::String ^> ^ GetFormats(bool autoConvert);
abstract member GetFormats : bool -> string[]

param.name: autoConvert
param.span: 若要擷取與儲存於這個執行個體中的資料相關的、或是可以轉換的所有格式則為 ；若只要擷取原生的資料格式則為 。

span.span: to retrieve all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to; to retrieve only native data formats.

summary.span: 取得與儲存於這個執行個體中的資料相關的，或者可以轉換的所有格式清單，使用布林值來決定要擷取資料可以轉換的所有格式，還是只要擷取原生的資料格式。

span.span: Gets a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to, using a Boolean value to determine whether to retrieve all formats that the data can be converted to or only native data formats.

returns.span: 名稱陣列，表示這個物件中儲存的資料所支援的所有格式的清單。

span.span: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以取得支援的資料格式，然後再呼叫方法。Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the method. 請參閱類別預先定義的格式。See the class for the predefined formats. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`GetFormats`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件 (`myDataObject`) 使用字串和`UnicodeText`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `UnicodeText` format. 然後它會取得與資料相關聯的格式的兩個查詢。Then it makes two queries to get the formats associated with the data. 在第一個查詢中，它會設定`autoConvert`參數`false`： 在此情況下，會傳回資料的原生格式。In the first query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` : in this case, only the native format of the data is returned. 在第二個查詢中，它會設定`autoConvert`參數`true`，好讓它取得的格式，包括資料可以轉換成的格式清單。In the second query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`, so that it gets the list of formats, including the formats that the data can be converted to. 在每個案例中，結果清單會顯示在訊息方塊。In each case, the resulting list is displayed in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/CPP/getformats2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/CS/getformats2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/VB/getformats2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將指定的資料和其相關的格式儲存於這個執行個體中。

span.span: Stores the specified data and its associated format in this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetData (object data);

Public Sub SetData (data As Object)
public: void SetData(System::Object ^ data);
abstract member SetData : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 要儲存的資料。

span.span: The data to store.

summary.span: 使用格式的資料類別，將指定的資料儲存於這個執行個體中。

span.span: Stores the specified data in this instance, using the class of the data for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式衍生自資料類別。The format is derived from the data class. 使用這個方法儲存的資料可以轉換成相容的格式，並在擷取時。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它會建立元件 (`myComponent`) 並將它儲存在資料物件 (`myDataObject`)。First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`). 然後它會檢查指定的資料是否會儲存在資料物件，並在訊息方塊中顯示結果。Then it checks whether the specified data is stored in the data object, and displays the result in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/CPP/setdata1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/CS/setdata1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/VB/setdata1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不知道目標應用程式格式，您可以使用此方法的多個格式儲存資料。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 使用這個方法儲存的資料可以轉換成相容的格式，並在擷取時。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件 (`myDataObject`) 會將字串儲存在指定的物件和`UnicodeText`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a string in the object specifying the `UnicodeText` format. 然後它會擷取該資料儲存在指定的物件`Text`格式化，以便將資料轉換成`Text`格式。Then it retrieves that data stored in the object specifying the `Text` format, so that the data is converted to the `Text` format. 結果會顯示在訊息方塊。The result is displayed in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/CPP/setdata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/CS/setdata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/VB/setdata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不知道目標應用程式格式，您可以使用此方法的多個格式儲存資料。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 使用這個方法儲存的資料可以轉換成相容的格式，並在擷取時。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它會建立元件 (`myComponent`) 並將它儲存在資料物件 (`myDataObject`)，並使用`myType`指定資料格式。First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`), using `myType` to specify the data format. 然後它會檢查指定之類型的資料是否會儲存在物件，並在訊息方塊中顯示結果。Then it checks whether the data of the specified type is stored in the object, and displays the result in a message box. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不知道目標應用程式格式，您可以使用此方法的多個格式儲存資料。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用類別，它會實作`IDataObject`，以示範如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它會建立資料物件 (`myDataObject`)，並將`UnicodeText`字串，`autoConvert`參數設定為`false`。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a `UnicodeText` string in it, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 然後它會擷取儲存物件中的資料相關聯的格式，並，並在訊息方塊中顯示結果。Then it retrieves the format(s) associated with the data stored in the object and displays the result in a message box. 與資料相關聯的唯一格式是`UnicodeText`格式。The only format associated with the data is the `UnicodeText` format. 這個範例假設您已建立名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`.
